related_post.text: db.exec is variadic so you can basically create a slice of the values you want to insert and then run ``` _ err := db.Exec(stmt valueArgs...)``` theres a full example here https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12486436/howdoibatchsqlstatementswithpackagedatabasesql but it assumes that youre using a sqlite3 implementation that extends that db interface  (disclaimer) probably theres someone else here who knows more than me though
